price: Sie fürchten ihren Herrn über sich und tun, was ihnen befohlen wird.
arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
